channel.title: Delta NPC Drops? Please Help!
channel.description:
So I asked this question a few months back but never got a reply :(
In a delta NPC drops are put into the nocdrops.cfg file which I'm sure everyone knows, but when you put in the last number in a line, (how often something drops) it makes it so it's the chance of receiving not only that item, but other possible drops as well. It's hard to explain, but here i'll try and make some more sense of it:
Here's an example of possible drops for a Man.
[code=java]//Man npcdrop = 1 526 1 100 npcdrop = 1 995 500 50 npcdrop = 1 494 1 10 npcdrop = 1 841 1 8 npcdrop = 1 882 50 8 npcdrop = 1 1062 250 1[/code]
There is a 50% chance to receive 500 coins as a drop, but also smaller chances for other items. It's possible, yet not as likely, to receive the coins and another item in the same drop, which is what I want to fix. I want to make it so when you kill an NPC, you can only receive two items, such as bones/ashes, and another item.
Hopefully this makes sense, I think most 508's work this way but I don't have an experience with 508's so not sure. Help of any kind would be greatly appreciated
